Detailed Description

template<class IBASIS, unsigned int DIM_d, unsigned int DIM_m = DIM_d>
class FrameTL::Functional< IBASIS, DIM_d, DIM_m >

Base class for representation of a functional with respect to a given wavelet (frame) basis. The function to which the functional is to be applied is given as a (frame) index. This class models functionals of the form . Other (more complicated) functionals need to be implemented in an inherited class.
